vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.11;
daughter of: Solomon (H8010);
sister of: Basemath (H1315) and Rehoboam (H7346); married to Ben-abinadab (H1125)
§ Taphath = "ornament"
the daughter of Solomon who was married to Ben-Abinadab
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Salomón; esposa de Ben-abinadab
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
他法 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "裝飾"
所羅門王的女兒之一, 嫁於便亞比拿達為妻(王上 4:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
他法 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "装饰"
所罗门王的女儿之一, 嫁于便亚比拿达为妻(王上 4:11)
